name: Mastery
description: Mastery is a local versus multiplayer game. There is a health and stock system where the goal is to kill your opponent while the walls close in on you. Health can fluctuate as you land a successful parry or when disarming an opponent. There is a dodge roll and blocking feature while attacks are also direction based so there is a delay when turning your character. If you tap the attack button lightly you will do a quick attack, hold for a heavy attack. The game has a simple move set but a complex set of interactions which makes for an exciting and fun experience, Hope you enjoy playing our game!
